text:
We've used Ivanti SC for 6+ years since it was called Shavlik. Excellent
product. We're weaning off and onto Azure Update Manager for cost (not
really cheaper) and because we're migrating to M365/Azure and apparently need to
justify it by using all the bells and whistles. Azure Update Manager works well,
but no non-MS patches. 
Bruce
System Admin
Financial Institution
350 Servers

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] If not Ivanti, what?
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from droidpixel4bruce@gmail.com. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification]
